instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165-A Fan Issue
threads.message:
Hi, i have an  820-00165-A  machine with the fan spinning at full speed as soon as loads the OS.

It has no liquid damage, all temps are under 60 degrees celsius, the CPU is not throttled (machine works as regular), no issue at apple diagnostics. 

I can change the fan speed with a temp monitoring app

threads.title: 820-00165-A Fan Issue
threads.message:
Any history available?
Try first cleaning ME region in BIOS.
Also test disconnecting webcam and changing trackpad flex/board.
